get.summary: Get enabled SSO connectors by the given email's domain
get.description: Extract the email domain from the provided email address. Returns all the enabled SSO connectors that match the email domain.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to find the enabled SSO connectors.

200.description: The enabled SSO connectors have been successfully retrieved.

connectorIds.description: The list of enabled SSO connectorIds. Returns an empty array if no enabled SSO connectors are found.

400.description: The email address is invalid, can not extract a valid domain from it.

post.description: Create WebAuthn authentication options for passkey sign-in. The user will be resolved later by the credential during verification.

200.description: Passkey sign-in WebAuthn authentication options have been successfully created.

authenticationOptions.description: The WebAuthn authentication options for initiating passkey sign-in.
